author: Simon Difford
description: For those, like me, who prefer their Gin Fizz with the addition of egg white.
name: Silver Fizz
recipeIngredient: 60 ml Brandy, whisk(e)y, gin, rum etc.
30 ml Freshly squeezed lemon or lime juice
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass (no ice)
